vote.title: Appointment of Alternate Member to School Construction Bond Citizensâ€™ Oversight Committee (Sup Res-003-23/24)
vote.description: Resolved, That the Governing Board of the Los Angeles Unified School District ratifies the appointment of Ms. Santa Ramirez, representing the Los Angeles Tenth District of the California Congress of Parents, Teachers and Students, Inc. (10th District PTSA), as an alternate member to the School Construction Bond Oversight Committee for a two-year term commencing immediately. Ms. Ramirez is not an employee, official, vendor, contractor, or consultant of the District.
